summary.span: 指定用于在屏幕上显示对话框的基类。

span.span: Specifies the base class used for displaying dialog boxes on the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承类需要通过调用 来创建特定的通用对话框，来实现 。Inherited classes are required to implement by invoking to create a specific common dialog box. 继承的类可以选择重写 以实现特定的对话框挂钩功能。Inherited classes can optionally override to implement specific dialog box hook functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 的 实现，并演示如何创建和显示对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating and showing a dialog box. 此示例需要从现有窗体中调用方法，该窗体具有 ，并 放置在该窗体上。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form, which has a and placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HelpRequest As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户单击通用对话框中的“帮助”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the Help button on a common dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 设置 属性的对象。The following code example demonstrates initializing a object setting the , properties. 对象不允许用户设置自定义颜色，但允许显示一组完整的基本颜色。The object does not allow the user to set a custom color, but it allows the full set of basic colors to be displayed. 通过将 "" 属性设置为 "false"，可以在颜色为256或更低的系统上显示与其他颜色组合的颜色。By setting the property to false, it allows the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 该示例还演示如何设置 属性以及如何处理对话框的 事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog box. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，然后在窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeColorDialog` 方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例要求按钮的 `Click` 事件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Protected Overridable Function HookProc (hWnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wparam As IntPtr, lparam As IntPtr) As IntPtr
protected: virtual IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
abstract member HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint override this.HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint

span.span: The handle to the dialog box window.
The message being received.
Additional information about the message.
Additional information about the message.

summary.span: 定义要重写的通用对话框挂钩过程，以便向通用对话框添加特定功能。

span.span: Defines the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

returns.span: 如果默认对话框过程处理此消息，则为零值；如果默认对话框过程忽略此消息，则为非零值。

span.span: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 挂钩过程是一种机制，通过该机制，函数可在事件到达应用程序之前截获这些事件。A hook procedure is a mechanism by which a function can intercept events before they reach an application. 当你覆盖 类的 方法时，操作系统将调用函数的重写，以将操作系统消息发布到该窗口。When you override the method for a class, the operating system invokes your override of the function to post operating system messages to the window. 默认情况下，挂钩过程在屏幕上将对话框显示为响应 WM_INITDIALOG 消息。By default, the hook procedure centers the dialog box on the screen in response to a WM_INITDIALOG message. > [!NOTE] > 此方法使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用该方法;只有直接调用方才需要具有 权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果你的代码可从部分受信任的代码调用，则不要将用户输入传递给 类方法，无需验证。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass user input to class methods without validation. 有关使用 `LinkDemand` 成员的重要限制，请参阅[Demand 与 LinkDemand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。For important limitations on using the `LinkDemand` member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5). 此属性还使用 安全属性;若要重写此成员，派生类必须具有 `CustomPermission` 权限。This property also uses the security attribute; to override this member, the derived class must have the `CustomPermission` permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 该示例包含继承 类的类。The example consists of a class that inherits the class. 在类的 重写中，该示例根据特定窗口消息的常量值计算方法的 `msg` 参数。In the class's override, the example evaluates the method's `msg` parameter against constant values for particular Windows messages. 如果 `msg` 参数等于指定的常量，则该示例将编写跟踪输出，用于标识传递到 方法的 Windows 消息。If the `msg` parameter equals the specified constant, the example writes trace output identifying the Windows message that was passed to the method. 此示例假定声明 方法的类继承了 类。This example assumes that the class in which the method is declared inherits the class. [!code-cpp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CPP/fontdialogoverride.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CS/fontdialogoverride.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/VB/fontdialogoverride.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承类可以重写此方法，以便向通用对话框添加特定功能。

span.span: Inheriting classes can override this method to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击 "帮助" 按钮时，将调用此方法。This method is invoked when the Help button is clicked. 继承类可以重写此方法以处理事件。Inheriting classes can override this method to handle the event.

summary.span: 定义要重写的所有者窗口过程，以便向通用对话框添加特定功能。

span.span: Defines the owner window procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

returns.span: 消息处理的结果，它依赖于所发送的消息。

span.span: The result of the message processing, which is dependent on the message sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息发送到通用对话框的所有者窗口时，将在此传输控件。Control is transferred here when messages are sent to the owner window of the common dialog box. 继承类可以重写此方法，以便向通用对话框添加特定功能。Inheriting classes can override this method to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通用对话框的用户调用 时，将调用此方法，并且必须由 的继承类重写以实现特定的通用对话框。This method is invoked when the user of a common dialog box calls , and it must be overridden by inherited classes of to implement a specific common dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的 方法允许您指定特定的窗体或控件，该窗体或控件将拥有显示的对话框。This version of the method allows you to specify a specific form or control that will own the dialog box that is shown. 如果使用不带任何参数的此方法的版本，则当前应用程序的当前活动窗口将自动拥有显示的对话框。If you use the version of this method that has no parameters, the dialog box being shown would be owned automatically by the currently active window of your application.
